wikitext.*:
'''''-uva''''' is a [[Quenya]] future tense ending. 

A final -a drops out before the ending -uva is added; quanta- "fill", future tense quantuva "shall fill".

==Examples==
* lait'''uva'''lmet = "we shall bless them"<ref>{{RK|Cormallen}}</ref>
* tir'''uva'''ntes = “they will guard it”
* enquant'''uva''' = "shall refill"
* cen'''uva''' = "Shall see"<ref>{{MC|Secret}}</ref>
* entul'''uva''' = "Come again" <ref>{{CH|2}}</ref>

{{references}}
